Section.Catchline: Negotiations; public meetings and records exemptions.

SectionBody.Text: Negotiations held between an insurer and the Florida Workers’ Compensation Insurance Guaranty Association are exempt from the provisions of s. 286.011 and s. 24(b), Art. I of the State Constitution. Documents related to such negotiations that reveal identifiable payroll and loss and individual claim information are confidential and exempt from the provisions of s. 119.07(1) and s. 24(a), Art. I of the State Constitution.
